website_summaries.verdict: Somewhat pricey, but if you're willing to pay more for a sleek look, heavy-duty construction, and expandable convenience, this is a solid option.
pros: Industrial strength steel wire frame with a corrosion-resistant finish is exceptionally sturdy and built to last
Maximum weight capacity surpasses others on our list
Boasts a total of 10 shelves and 2 hanging rods
Width conveniently extends from 58 to 83 inches in 1-inch increments
cons: Despite its elegant appearance, clothes are left vulnerable to accumulating dust without a cover

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought for my bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this closet organizer!! I set it up one a wall of my bedroom extended from one end to the other. Now mu husband can have more than 2 feet of space in the main closet =) I did not use both hanging bars in the middle because I needed the space for my 30+ dresses. This is super sturdy and well made. I got the bronze/brown color because it has wider shelves compared to the other ones. I was also able to diy add a curtain rod in the front to keep my Newf from slobbering allover my clothes hehe
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana T. Batz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good for organization and storage. Im turning a spare bedroom into a closet. This took about 1hr to put together by myself. It holds up really well. It's hard to see the extension rods on the sides but they have a plate that screw into the wall. This was large enough for me to only use one extension in a 12ft wide room.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, durable quality. I got the bronze one and it's a beautiful color. I've had mine for a couple months now and it's amazing! Go to Home Depot or target and you pay more for something that's of low quality compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tlee

customer_reviews.title: Configurable to your liking and space requirements.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and configurable to the user's liking and space requirements. My closet is quite a bit narrower than this shelf at its narrowest suggested configuration, so I offset the two top shelves in order to collapse it a bit more. I put a long expanding bar across the top and left out a few of the shelves for more hanging space. Haven't put anything in it yet but if I have any issues I'll update my review!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjustable. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this. We actually bought it to go in our hall for the new baby's clothes and whatnot. It was easy to put together. It is sturdy and most importantly, adjustable. I actually have a small dresser in the space between shelves so I put the second clothes rod nearer to the back of the shelf than the middle. Worked out perfectly. It also comes with decent shelf liners, so that was a plus as well. If you're looking for something like this product I would recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new place that lacked closet space but I have a huge bathroom. This product helped me utilize that space. There were lots of organizers but I read the other reviews for this one and determined this one to be the most sturdy. And they were right. I have even more clothes on it than there are in the picture and its still standing strong, the bars don't sag and the unit is extremely stable. My package and its contents arrived in perfect condition and I had it installed within 30 minutes. I am very satisfied with my purchase. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small space in my room for my daughters closet space. I was very limited on options, and this has ticked all of the boxes and then some. It was very easy to assemble. Clear instructions, all the tools you need are provided, and I did it by myself at 8 months pregnant! It has PLENTY of storage space from the top to the bottom. The only thing I added was an extra rod for a second tier of hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: What a great addition
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition! I had one side of the closet just an open wall and this fit perfectly. However, one thing that did not fit were the bars that would go on the outside. That is okay for now since the rest of it fit perfectly and is being utilized 100%. It took me a while to put this together as it was just me so it took some creative balancing to get the shelves on without the locks falling but I got it! YAY ME RIGHT? I would definitely purchase again and I might once I remodel and open up more space.
customer_reviews.author: Ruebixcube

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy organizer with adjustable legs
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy organizer with adjustable legs. Note: My closet is shorter than the minimum size of organizer. Here is how I got it to work; 1) Instead of using the longer inside rods, I used the outer shorter rods on the inside. 2) I positioned one of the top shelves one position higher than the other to allow for overlap. Also, note: The size given for the shelves is for the shelf itself, it doesn't allow for the rods, so I couldn't use my existing containers. The actual size is approximately: 15 1/2 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: itguy

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with this product and will be purchasing another one ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to work in retail so I have a lot of clothes and my standard closet would not hold everything. I have a small bedroom, as well, and needed something that could adjust and withstand a lot of weight. It's been really difficult trying to find something that could adjust in size, hold a lot of weight, and not break or fall over. This organizer met all of those needs and costs much less than the other alternatives that I found. I am really happy with this product and will be purchasing another one for my soon-to-be laundry area in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Closet
customer_reviews.text: We were in need of more closet space, so we decided to make our small den a walk in closet. This closet organizer did a wonderful job of making a room a closet! Once it was assembled, we began to fill it up. Holds quite a bit of clothing. This was certainly easier than having to have a carpenter come in and build a closet. In the event that we should decide we no longer need the closet space this can be disassembled and we have a den again!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadine T. Markey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have bought shelves like these before these are not very sturdy clamps to not stay together very well and they are wobbly. Not happy with these at all actually just took them all apart and ended up building closets myself. Nothing like one similar like this that I bought in the past would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this shelf/closet. My daughter and I built it. Meaning it was easy to put together. It is really sturdy especially when not telescoping out the rods. The ad says the rods can hold up to 100 lbs when rods aren't extended. I believe it could easily handle that. We had a much cheaper type if one of these things before. It was large, not at all sturdy, and looked tacky. I am so glad I spent the extra money and bought such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Laundry room storage wizardry...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my laundry room, because there was about two feet of wasted space along the wall behind my clothes drying rack. It arrived promptly, my 9yo daughter and I put it together in about 45 minutes, and now I've got all this great storage space, as well as a place to hang dry my clothes! I love this organizer. It is sturdy, well designed, easy to assemble, adjustable -- and it looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to put together
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this product is, it’s not a one person set up job. I am a single mom and my daughter is too little to help me set it up. If you don’t have someone to help you, do not buy this product because you will never get past the first step. It’s quite Frustrating that the things you put in the legs for the shelves pop off as soon as you put the shelf on them. They don’t stay in place. Poor design. Won’t ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Can't Recommend This Enough!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly took me any time at all to set this up, an hour tops. Easily the sturdiest standing closet I've ever owned and it holds so much. I've been considering purchasing bed risers to put under this and make it just a bit taller to have the ability to lower the bottom pole a bit. The packaging was a bit torn, but that's probably shippings fault. None of the pieces were dented, broken, missing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Huff

customer_reviews.title: Really cool closet organizer for space
customer_reviews.text: Really cool closet organizer for space. Unless you’re really great at putting things together, I highly suggest that you pay for someone to assemble it. It’s an option when you add the item to your Amazon cart. I did not pay extra for assembly, and had to have a friend help me. It’s also just quite difficult putting it together with your own two hands. Otherwise it’s really cute and I’m pretty happy for the purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: JEH

customer_reviews.title: I Got My Money’s Worth
customer_reviews.text: I bought the expandable bronze for my second bedroom (my walk in closet). After going through a couple cheap versions of closet storage organizers similar to this, I finally decided to spend more on one good one. I’m so glad I found this, and it’s definitely with the extra money spent. It’s very sturdy. It took me an hour or so to put it together by myself. That’s the only complaint I have about this organizer. It comes with a couple pieces for securing the organizer to the wall. I opted not to use them, but are nice to have just in case. Absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great free standing closet! Very sturdy and easy to put together as long as you make sure to keep in mind the lettering for each product. Make sure to read the directions and it’ll be easy to construct! My only dislike is the capacity for hanging, I wish there was more. But other than that this product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: We use it in our laundry room and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in our laundry room with my washer and dryer under it. I just did not install the bottom clothes rail. We love it! On the shelves we put the cleaners, a small garbage can, and our dog food container. On the top we have some mops and brooms, and we use the top clothes rail to hang clothes up that can't go in the dryer. A great cheap way to upgrade your laundry room!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Achee

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent organizer! Not only was I convinced on it's sturdiness when the box first arrived and was VERY heavy, but assembly was much more of a breeze than I expected and this was up and ready to go within an hour. I LOVE the structural composition and it is doing an awesome job of supporting my more-than-modest wardrobe :) The color is really nice and gives an elegant feel to my closet. I've expanded a little under a foot to allow my items space to hang and it works wonderfully. Well worth it and I highly recommend to anyone else looking to purchase an item like this. You will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: MothToAFlame

customer_reviews.title: This is a space saver
customer_reviews.text: I offset the middle bars to make it easier to hang jackets on both bars. This was a game changer for my apartment. My roommates and I have collectively anywhere from 20-40 jackets on it at a time. We use one side of the shelving unit for shoes, and the other for bags, and hats.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product was definitely worth the price. It is very sturdy took a little time to put together. The instructions were easy to follow but after putting the shelves as instructed I took the time to rear age to my needs. I recommend this product and happy to feel more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping is my Game :)

customer_reviews.title: This is THE PERFECT, amazing shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: This is THE PERFECT, amazing shelving unit!!! It does exactly what is is supposed to do (see illustration, description). I am old & short & putting it to ether went off like clockwork--very doable. Finished it is practical, sturdy, & aesthetically pleasing for metal shelving, all for a reasonable price! In contrast: I had earlier purchased a CloestMaid particle board arrangement which my daughter & I worked on together. After having spent $$ & one whole afternoon trying to assemble about 1/3 of the complete unit (a total nightmare to assemble, wobbly--you had to bolt it to the wall--, & unattractive), I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: J-the-L

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and high quality - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This. is. GREAT. It is sturdy, adjustable, looks nice, and very functional. I made an 'L' shaped closet out of it by purchasing a similar style shelf with a 14" side. I took one of the expandable clothes hanging bars and attached it perpendicular to this shelf, attaching to the other 14" adjustable wire shelf. I love it. I will be purchasing at least one more as I reorganize closets and kids' rooms. I highly recommend this versatile and high quality shelf. Bonus, it came with straps to anchor to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SMom5

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: You must have two people to get assembly started! It is not as heavy duty as similar shelves. If it were two inches taller it would be better. To keep bottom clothes from dragging the floor, the top rod clothes hang on top of the bottom rod,
customer_reviews.author: Belinda O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: spoiler alert: it's dope
customer_reviews.text: This closet organizer thing is the dopest thing I've ever bought for my room. If you're like me and have a lot of clothes and not a whole lot of space, get this closet (but measure first just to be sure!) Storage and space GALORE. Kind of a pain to put together if you're by yourself and have a very curious cat wandering around during the process, but it's very sturdy. An unexpected plus is if you have a cat, they'll love the box it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: These work perfect for what I'm looking to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as closet replacements. They're strong. I really like the color. These work perfect for what I'm looking to do. My only complaint is that they could stand to be another foot taller. There isn't enough space between the upper and lower bar, so I'm constantly moving clothes out of the way so I don't hook them with the hanger. The clothes on the lower bar sit on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bosak

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it is not as sturdy as other Seville shelving that I own.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good and quick closet organizer. I had assumed that the quality was that of my other Seville shelving that I have in other closets. I would not use this shelving as a bookshelf As I did with the more sturdy ones that I have purchased from Seville.
customer_reviews.author: JustLittleOleMe

customer_reviews.title: Design options.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily after I figured out how the clamps worked. Shelves can be arranged as desired. I put 6 shelves on one side to allow for an area on the other side to hang long garments. Like that it includes shelf liners that are cut to fit.
customer_reviews.author: ctohio

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Take your time assembling. The more attention to detail you put in, and finesse... the longer it will last and the better the assembled product will turn out. My girlfriend loves this thing. She has all her shoes and blouses on display making it easy for her to pick out what she is going to wear for the day. Seriously! This cut down 15 minutes in her deciding what to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive storage
customer_reviews.text: OK, so the clips fell off a LOT during construction, leading one of my helpers to quit in disgust. And the shelves are too narrow for standard boxes to fit, and too few to make stacking things seem a good idea because they may be more than a foot or more apart. And those floating top shelves became sit-on-the floor shelvs because they just look ridiculous up there. I will figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Waters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Put this unit together in less than 30 minutes. It holds a good amount of clothes, as well as shoe boxes, storage containers, and even a couple of heavy file boxes on top. Very sturdy. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: darbysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Works as Advertised. It’s a nice unit. It was shipped in its factory box which led to the first one being damaged, they replaced it fast, the second one was undamaged. It went together pretty quick and was up and running in about 30 minutes with no tools. A rubber mallet would be helpful if you aren’t too experienced at putting these types of shelves together.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Put it together exactly where you want it because you WILL NOT be able to move it.. the entire thing WILL fall apart if you try to move it.. it is held together by little plastic clips that any little bit of pressure can force apart, which inturn will make the whole contraption fall apart.. The instructions are very vague, you basically wing the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I ordered this despite some bad reviews because my item arrived in perfect condition. Nothing was bent or damaged. This was not that difficult to assemble and a lot easier and faster with two people. As you can see it is able to hold A LOT and it is very sturdy but it still comes with an option to screw into wall for extra precaution. Thank you for my item I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, great closet organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Review for Seville Classics Expandable Closet Organizer System, UltraZinc; Best $120.00 I have ever spent. Very sturdy, even when fully extended, looks classy and holds all of mine and my husbands clothes! We love this, and if we move we can take it with us. Great quality and I am sold on Seville products.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Positive

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are off
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this wardrobe but the measurements for the shelves is reversed and incorrect, the length is 16 and the width is 11. So my cube storage bins i have will not fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Char T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet assembled or used this system, so I cannot say more than the price, delivery, appearance of strength and high quality of the product tells me it suits my needs and likely will look good and last for a very long while.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Bhan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to increase your storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Living in a vintage apartment in Chicago means not living with a lot of closet space. I set this up in my bedroom instead of inside the closet. I use this to hold all of my button-up shirts and my pants. Having my clothing exposed forces me to keep it somewhat organized as well. This allowed me to use the limited closet space I do have to store other household items like a vacuum cleaner, ironing board, window air conditioners, etc. - keeping them out of sight. These shelves are very durable and really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: James E

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I like the sturdiness of the product and the presentation. The box it came in looked horrible but luckily it came with all the pieces. I like this product for our second closet that did not come with an organizer. The straps are kind of poorly made so I went to hone depot to get different anchors but I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tarrance Green

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty good and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a closet and bought this to hold my clothes. It looks pretty good and is sturdy. I would have liked more shelves for the clothes but it gets the job done. Surprisingly, it took about an hour to set up since I had to assemble all the small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, versatile
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, versatile, and fairly easy to assemble and install. I put this together by myself in about an hour and a half, an extra pair of hands might have made the job a little faster. The first set of shelves were the most tedious, since the instructs weren't very clear as to the appropriate height of each self, but once the first set was done, the second was much easier....recommend using the first set of shelves as a guide for the second set. Only complaint is that some shelves were tweaked/damaged, and had to be hammered back into alignment before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to update my closet. One of the shelf/hanging rod, just tumble down and I didn’t feel like putting it back, it involved a lot of work. It was easy to assemble, it fit perfectly and is pleasing to the eyes. My son said it looks like an one of those IKEA closet display.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A. Poletti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when Closet walls are not supporting the clothes
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute solution to a recurring closet issue in which the wall racks were continually pulling out of the wall as the studs were not ideally positioned. We pulled out the old anchors, plastered the holes and put this inside instead. It holds a lot more clothing, especially when I added baskets to the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Waters

customer_reviews.title: High quality storage for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sturdy storage piece because it is adaptable to the minimum and maximum size it suggests. My husband and 12 year old granddaughter put it together in less than an hour. It provides all the space my closet needed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item I was very happy with the structure and simplicity . I put this together within 30 minutes very easy to assemble the finish look nice product is very sturdy would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Measure first! Expensive to return.
customer_reviews.text: The issue I have is really more with myself than with the product or the seller. I ordered this before moving to a new house. I thought expandable meant adjustable, so I figured it would fit my 64-in H closet. It is too tall, and can only be shortened with a metal cutting tool. At 53 lbs, it will cost me a minimum of $60 to return, which is over half the price of the unit itself. Measure first!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: NIce design, one of the shelves broke in shipping
customer_reviews.text: NIce design, one of the shelves broke in shipping. The company was fast to replace the broken piece. My closet has a thick carpet, which makes it a little wobbly. So I fastened it to the wall behind and now it's very secure. It was fast and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Cozzocrea

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered and manufactured
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other Seville products, and this was typical. It is well planned and well made. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MTB Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Looks stunning
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to put together the first time. We bought three to replace wire shalving in closets. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Fig

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two years ago and it is still by far one of my favorite purchases. Super sturdy and holds a lot! I do remember assembly being a b*tch but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job laying everything out so you can see what you have. Only complaint is the clips used to rest the shelves on; it's thicker than it should be and the shelves do not completely cover them, leaving black rings around the poles. Lacks a "flush" look that would class it up quite a bit. The setup did not take long and was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Baran

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase. Wasn’t disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was perfect for what I needed. It was pretty easy to assemble, but having a second person to put the bars up would have made that part faster. However, it is definitely doable alone; I was able to figure it out. It seems pretty sturdy but I made it a point to put items from bottom to top first and at this point I don’t have a lot of clothes hanging on it yet. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Shelves look and feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall, but resin shelves are cheap looking and scratch super easily. Ordered 2 and both had scratches. I wouldn’t buy this particular color/style again. I have the chrome version with wire shelves and it’s much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy garment rack.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of garment racks and this is the best one. It is sturdy and holds a lot of clothes without collapsing. Very sturdy and easy to move around. I use it to hang my clothes when I iron and to hang clothes to pack when traveling. The best one I have used.
customer_reviews.author: JFH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small closet. It's much sturdier than the one I got at Walmart. It is full of clothes and the bars haven't bent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our new house, as previous owners had no closet rods or shelving for some odd reason. These had easy to assemble instructions, and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie S

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Sturdy even tho some of the sleeves (black thingees) slipped when shelves were put on. Adjustable to fit inside a variety of closet spaces. I did not attach to wall and it seems fine. Clean, uncomplicated to what I had in closet beforehand. (Braces, shelfs, poles attached to wall that, one night, crashed after critical mass precipitated a dastardly three-day nightmare.)
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Lavid

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend getting this
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a very study, gorgeous way to make a closet or even a partition in the bedroom or anywhere, I highly recommend getting this. Very well made, super firm and looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonist

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The areas on the sides I had planned to put bins in them. The bins I have already dont fit. It moves around and I'm working on attaching it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... old metal wire systems with these and they are awesome. The perfect amount of storage and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old metal wire systems with these and they are awesome. The perfect amount of storage and easy to setup. They are sturdy and a good replacement for a custom build closet system.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Poe

customer_reviews.title: Smart design and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks nicer and feel more sturdy than I expected. Smart design ! BUT still, there is another unit by AmazonBasics, very similar, yet lower in price.
customer_reviews.author: Zheng8472

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for extra storage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for guest who are staying for a bit and need their own storage places it’s perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy A Tan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, holds so much clothes, would recommend to anybody! A+++❤️👍👌
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleasantly surprised by how amazing this closet set up is! It is so adorable and is able to hold so many clothes. I was able to buy cubes to slide in the slots on the sides and it looks so adorable. It's amazing how many clothes does think it hold. It is so durable it's almost better then my regular closet LOL
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McClain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wardrobes with lots of space
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about these wardrobes enough. I bought two of them and converted a spare bedroom into a closet using both. They were easy to assemble and extremely durable. I love how easy it was to increase hanging space by just pulling the sections apart. I will keep these for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our closet. My husband assembled it without my help. It looks sturdy. We’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Redsnapper

customer_reviews.title: Its better than a regular closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy with a ton of space to store. I have ordered 2!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. I would have given it 5 stars except that I don't like to way the top shelf looks (the one which extends from each tower on the ends) They don't line up square with each other, and I wouldn't put anything heavy there. What I'll most likely do, is attach some sort of support so both shelves are connected. PS - the unit is not extended at all, it's at its narrowest width.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy for my taste. Once stretched it feels flimsy and it's not wide enough. More for a laundry room than a closet or closet replacement
customer_reviews.author: Renesme

customer_reviews.title: Love this closet organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I am so glad we purchased this. All my clothes fit on it. It’s very sturdy and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: this is the greatest product and assembles so easily
customer_reviews.text: this is the greatest product and assembles so easily. Instructions were easy to read and pieces fit properly. so thankful for this nice addition to the closet area.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Maiden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as you can see
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of my them for both mine and my daughter’s closet they both are excellent good quality and exactly what I needed to capatilize on the small amount of space
customer_reviews.author: Janee

customer_reviews.title: Solved My Problem
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was an easy solution to organizing the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Troy@Protekt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and rather easy to assemble considering size
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Built this a few days ago and loaded it up with clothes and shoes. Actually really straight forward setup if you read the basic instructions thoroughly. Don’t skip or overlook any steps! Looks good and feels super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Kalfon

customer_reviews.title: Very durable closet
customer_reviews.text: Best closet I've had to date. It is able to withstand arms least 50lbs and has so much storage space. My only complaint is that the instructions could be a little bit more clear and the lower rod is a little to low.
customer_reviews.author: Alizeabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks good and I have had no ...
customer_reviews.text: My current closet is very small. I put this up in my room to add more storage and more space to hang my clothes. Love it, looks good and I have had no negative issues with it. Would buy again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Blenman

customer_reviews.title: Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I just have it sitting up in my room work great - had one once before and loved it - glad to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Cummings

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of my greatest purchases, I put all my clothes and some shoes on here and it’s surprisingly very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Romario J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together in under an hour. Excellent quality & sturdy. I have bought closet organizers in the past that are inferior to this one. Very happy to have found one that will last. So happy that I'm buying another one for a different closet in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for your closet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shelves. Easy to put together, all parts and pieces fit perfectly. The design also allows for such a variety of ways to install the shelves and get a truly custom solution for your closet. For example my closet is square and does not have one long wall to put this unit on. So I broke it up into 2 separate units and installed on both sides of my closet. It looks great and my cloths are organized just the way I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Maryia Arlova

customer_reviews.title: Design and practical
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture! I think it is really cute in the bedroom and it can contain a lot. Pretty sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: maylis d.

customer_reviews.title: It will freestand
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shelving unit to place in the center of my master closet instead of against a wall. It has stood by itself with no concerns (on carpet surface). I like that I'm able to adjust each shelf to my preference. I would recommend the Seville Classics Double Rod Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.author: Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Good item, poor seller !!
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is great only, it does what it should do. The only reason why I am giving it 2 stars is because two of the top shelves where slightly bent. I sent an email to the seller but got no reply from the seller. I didn't want to go through the trouble of returning it after I built it. I am just disappointed with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bounhieng Somsamayvong

customer_reviews.title: best closet ever
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, easy to assemble. sooo much more room in my closet. I had two hanging linen shelves before this, and I found that If I cut them into pieces of 2, I have a basket for clothes, socks, underwear etc. on the shelves.. No need to by wicker baskets. I removed the clothes that I would not be wearing for the season, and stored them elsewhere in very heavy plastic bags made by Ziplock.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Portable closet
customer_reviews.text: Solid metal construction but it takes two people to put it together Best Buy I have ever made
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Balliet

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: So far good but should be around 6” taller for people that are taller and have longer outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Roc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this closet system because my closet could not fit any clothes. This has allowed me to hang all my clothes plus I can use the shelves for my jewelry and makeup. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Niqueeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Love this closet organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this closet organizer! So sturdy and I love the color. Once I got the hang of it, the organizer was easy to put together. Took about and hour or so, but not hard at all. The last organizer we had collapsed in just a few months. I don't see this collapsing...ever!
customer_reviews.author: IRENE CRAFT

customer_reviews.title: Love the expansion ability and it looks exactly like on ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked out fabulous. It only took my son less than an hour to put together. Love the expansion ability and it looks exactly like on the web site. Additionally, it is very sturdy. At the very top we were able to store extra comforters and storage bags. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuko

customer_reviews.title: Best system.
customer_reviews.text: The best closet organizer I've ever used. This is far superior to the Martha Stewart One we got from Sam's Club or the Closet Mate/Rubbermaid one, cheap too. Solidly built, holds a lot of clothing and accessories, still using them 3 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO ASSEMBLE, LOOKS GREAT, GD PRICE, BEST IF YOUR TOP ROW OF CLOSES ARE FOR SMALL TO AVERAGE HEIGHT, OTHERWISE TOP ROW WOULD OVERLAP BOTTOM ROW. I'M 5' SO IT'S PERFECT FOR ME, LOOK GREAT AND IT'S VERY STURDY. TIP: START ASSEMBLING FROM BOTTOM UP, AND WHEN SLIDING ON SELVES, BE MINDFUL AND CLICK ON SAME GROOVES.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: There was only one tricky part to the assembly but other then that it’s been a delight! My closet has never been so organized and everything so easily accessible! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: loved this shelf, great room and adjustable too make more space or close to make smaller. i’m using in our 2nd bedroom for all types of storage, blankets, winter jackets. it’s very sturdy, i have an oak wood floor and it is not wobbly at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, very simple to assemble (was done in 15-20mins), sturdy and great! Overall this is exactly what I was expecting and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase these again. Although they are good quality and fit our closet, the shelves on the sides are pretty much worthless. They do not fit a normal size plastic container which is what I have most of the things in I want to store.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: These are not as good as the ones that I have previously had, but they make my walk in closet so much more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Pinks

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to built ins
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 units. I connected 2 of them together to fit the length of a walk in closet on one side. They are easy to put together, and look great as an alternative to a true built in. Plus much less expensive than built ins with similar storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bilynda Molish

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation and Beautiful Storage unit.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived super fast but the box was damaged and one of the shelves was bent. I still give it 5 stars because installation was easy and the final product looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Valuable item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep a closet capacity in a limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Seville Classics Expandable Double-Rod Clothes Rack Closet Organizer System, 58" to 83" W x 14" D x 72"
product_meta.description:
Color:Satin Bronze| Style Name:Expandable

Tame your wardrobe with Seville Classics' Expandable Closet Organizer. Unit consists of two towers connected by two expandable hanging rods. Adjust the distance between the towers to fit your walk-in closet or create storage in any room. The frame is constructed from steel wire and finished in Satin Bronze. Easy to assemble; no tools required.

 * Two towers with extendable clothing racks to custom-fit your closet
 * Industrial-strength steel wire construction
 * Satin Bronze finish for protects against corrosion in dry environments 
 * Five shelves per tower with plastic shelving liners included
 * Shelves and hanging rods adjust at 1" increments
 * Wall mounting hardware included
 * Limited 10-year warranty
 * Clothes hangers NOT included

Specifications
Dimensions: 58" W (expandable up to 83") x 14" D x 72" H
Pole diameter: 3/4"
Shelf dimensions: 14" x 14"
Hanging rod capacity (unextended): 125 lbs.
Hanging rod capacity (extended): 50 lbs.
Capacity: 100 lbs. per shelf
Weight: 56.4 lbs.
Model #: SHE05814B

Whats in the Box?
8 pairs of poles
48 pairs of slip sleeves
8 leveling feet
8 shelves
2 top shelf
4 rod brackets
4 screws
2 expandable rodv 4 u-sleeve
8 shelf liners

10-Year Warranty
Seville Classics shelving is backed by a 10-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the durration of the warranty period.
feature_bullets: EXPANDS FROM 5 TO 7 FEET WIDE - Telescoping hanging rods connect each tower and adjust from 58" to 83" wide for a perfect fit to your space
CLOSET STORAGE - Enjoy 5 shelves per tower and organize your shoes, bags and accessories with the rest of your wardrobe
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION - Industrial-strength steel construction throughout finished in satin bronze for heavy-duty, high-capacity use and protection against corrosion in dry environments
CUSTOMIZABLE ORGANIZER - Adjust the height of the shelves and hanging rods at 1-inch increments for storage that suits your use
EASY TO ASSEMBLE WARDROBE - Simply screw-together and fit the shelves over the slip sleeves to complete. Easy to build yourself or with a friend!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars721 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 10-year manufacturer's warranty seville classics shelving is backed by a 10-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
specifications.Included Components: 8 small shelves, 4 rod brackets, 8 pairs of poles, 48 pairs of slip sleeves, 8 leveling feet
